title: Real-World Context-Based Intensive Algebra Course for Practical Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic equation manipulation, graph interpretation, and understanding of function concepts
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops), applying algebraic problem-solving scenarios from real workplace contexts

learning_goals: One can establish optimal resource allocation plans within a given budget using linear programming models
Real-life problems (e.g., investment portfolio construction, logistics route optimization) can be converted into algebraic equations and solved
One can simulate the process of optimizing objective functions under constraints by applying graph theory
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
